name: Nighttime Nightmare
description:
Nighttime Nightmare is a short horror game, in which you have to get home. When you get home, you take care of the things you do every day. However, an unexpected twist occurs that puts you in a serious situation.

Controls
  • WASD or Arrow keys - Movement
  • Mouse - Interact with objects and look around

This game was my first 3D Horror game so don't expect too much. It was made in a month and I learned a lot of new things that will help me to make better games in the future.
